title: Apparel Development Manager - Sports Equipment
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Apparel Development Manager Posted/Updated: 10-01-2015 Brief Job Description: As our Apparel Product Development Manager you will be responsible for leading the lifecycle of product through inception to final sampling stages whereas the product development team prepares for a handoff with China Production team for bulk placement.
